knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
pacman::p_load(ggplot2,dplyr,tidyr,hrbrthemes)

## Including Plots


```{r}
df <- vroom::vroom("~/Downloads/LeedsGeneral_wth_RESULTS_12month2021.csv") %>% janitor::clean_names()
df

```

```{r}
df %>% 
  select(-contaminant,-ambient,-zone_number_2,-zone_number_3,-zone_number_6,-zone_number_7,-zone_number_9:-zone_number_12) %>% 
  pivot_longer(!date_time) %>% 
  mutate(date_time=lubridate::dmy_hm(date_time)) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(x=date_time,y=value),alpha=0.4,size=0.05,shape=4)+
  facet_wrap(~name,ncol=1,nrow=4)+
  hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum(axis_text_size = 14,axis_title_size = 14)+
  # scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  xlab("")+
  ylab("CO2 (ppm)")+
  theme(legend.position = " ",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) ->a
```


```{r}

plotly::ggplotly(a)
```
